title: Terrible as the Dawn (3R103)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Spot a [Sauron] minion to wound Galadriel 3 times. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 Elves to prevent this.
Lore:	”'In the place of the Dark Lord, you would have a Queen… All shall love me and despair!'”
Rarity:	R
